Overview

Dylan Forrester or "D" is an ex-con who suffers from extreme antisocial personality disorder. Give his past and his mental health issues, he takes antidepressants, regularly sees a psychiatrist and tries to live a quiet life while out prison on parole. When D's brother, Sean, dies, he decides that he has to find out why. Although he breaks the terms of his parole by leaving the area to travel to where his family lives, D keeps in contact with his psychiatrist and attempts to maintain some form of mental stability. Yet, D has a dedicated FBI agent after him who refuses to give up the manhunt. He also finds himself facing off against mercenaries who attack his family while searching for something Sean hid from them. Dylan soon realizes that he must stop controlling his personality problems if he wants to save his loved ones and stop the armed men.
